title: Wicked Data: A Love Story
features: After a passionate relationship with the charismatic Swedish homoeopathic medico ‘Rags’ comes to an end, inventor, flamenco guitarist, cat lover Zach is hard up for love for the first time in years. When his meddling patent attorney urges him to try online dating he signs up to a popular dating site.Wicked Data is a hilarious tale about looking for love in a high technology world; a suspenseful interplay of intriguing, quirky characters, each with their own private motivations and influence on Zach’s world.
description: Andrew Dambe was born and grew up in apartheid-era South Africa and now lives in Melbourne, Australia. After a career mostly within aviation and Information Technology he first turned to writing as a journalist and editor of an industry helicopter publication. He plans to release a second novel in 2014.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/nr2bjis1ag204h5r97mn8ileaf._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Andrew Dambe', 'about': ['Andrew Dambe grew up in South Africa during the apartheid era. He now lives in country Victoria, Australia with his enduring wife and some animals that have occasionally found themselves to be models for the creatures in his stories.', 'In his time he has earned through various endeavours including inventing, product development, flying helicopters, technical and aviation writing, and playing guitar. Mostly though, and as much as he would have rather been doing any or all of the above - he has worked as a mainframe computer programmer. Creative writing has always been a passion but it is only since other occupations have given him the freedom that he has been able to take it to the next level.', "Andrew Dambe is a pseudonym - derived from his middle name and his mother's maiden name. He maintains that his real name is too long and unwieldy to inflict on anyone looking for a good read."]}
